pages.text: In the info screen chapter, you learned that you can assign modes to your cat. They will be discussed in further detail here.

pages.title: Docile
pages.text: In this mode your cat will follow you but not attack anything. They are ready for you to throw the toy.

pages.title: Wandering
pages.text: "In this mode your cat so stay near it's bowl and wait for your next command. To set you cat's bowl bring your cat within a few blocks of it.

pages.title: Attack
pages.text: In this mode your cat will follow you and attack anything that attacks you or that you attack.

pages.title: Tactical
pages.text: In this mode your cat will follow you but will not attack anything unless you use the command beam.

pages.title: Patrol
pages.text: In this mode your cat will patrol between 2-4 points (set using a command emblem) and attack monsters that try come into view.

pages.title: Guard
pages.text: Cats follow closely and attack any monsters that come close.

pages.title: Skittish
pages.text: The cat will avoid all other creatures, and sometimes its owner.
